definitions.example: These chocolates all look delicious. Whichever shall I choose?

definitions.definition: Irrespective of the one(s) that; no matter which one(s).
definitions.example: Whichever you pick, be content with it.

definitions.definition: Any or either one(s) that; the one(s) that.
definitions.example: I have a few books; please borrow whichever interest you.
I don't mind which you have. Take whichever.

definitions.definition: According to or depending upon which one(s).
definitions.example: I'll buy the red shirt or the blue shirt, whichever is cheaper.
